entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then periods of rain or snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
